text: These services develop at their own pace in response to local demand, however, and little can be done to stimulate them. In practice it has not proved possible as yet to attract "head offices and administrative and research establishments including sections of government departments and other public offices" on the scale needed "to establish the character of the town from the outset as one of diverse and balanced social composition' as recommended by the Reith Committee.
handwritten_text: These services develop at their own pace in response to local demand, however, and little can be done to stimulate them. In practice it has not proved possible as yet to attract "head offices and administrative and research establishments including sections of government departments and other public offices" on the scale needed "to establish the character of the town from the outset as one of diverse and balanced social composition' as recommended by the Reith Committee.
